courseleaf.text:
In 2013, UC Berkeley began publishing an online general catalog, the Berkeley Academic Guide. The Guide will be archived each year. Please revisit this page to access past editions once a new version is published. 

2013-14 Berkeley Bulletin (Berkeley Academic Guide)

2011-2013 and Earlier Catalogs  PDF versions of pre-2013 paper General Catalogs may be viewed on the UC Berkeley Library's Digital Assets page.
